text:
[redacted_name], alias [redacted_name], is a streamer enjoying his life as he can. He has what people mostly want: wonderful friends, a good job, hobbies.
[redacted_name] is his neighbor, handsome, with a pretty smile, always polite. [redacted_name] doesn't know him much, but he just knows that he likes him.
But he doesn't dare, doesn't have self-confidence enough to learn more about his neighbor.
He needs Fate to help him.
Or a ferret.
trans:
[redacted_name], alias [redacted_name], est un streamer qui profite de la vie comme il le peut. Il a ce que les gens recherchent le plus souvent : des amis formidables, un bon travail, des loisirs.
[redacted_name] est son voisin, beau, avec un joli sourire, toujours poli. [redacted_name] ne le conna√Æt pas beaucoup, mais il sait qu'il l'aime bien.
Mais il n'ose pas, il n'a pas assez confiance en lui pour en savoir plus sur son voisin.
Il a besoin de l'aide du destin.
Ou d'un furet.
